events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and have started processing the details for evaluation.
The candidate's application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software engineer and developer in their resume.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidateâ€™s application and coordinate the next steps efficiently.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to discuss their background, skills, and interest in the software engineering role.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening and expressed enthusiasm to proceed to the technical interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for next week to assess their coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
